result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Physical Abuse of Child-Intentionally Cause Bodily Harm

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda J Deweerd

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 5, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:33 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Amanda J Deweerd in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Amanda J Deweerd. 
Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas. Plea received by the Court. Case referred to branch 1 to schedule a status conference.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance on July 11, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance on July 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:42 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Trenton John Piltz Mr in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Amanda J Deweerd in court.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Amanda J Deweerd. 
Defendant waives right to a preliminary hearing and Court accepts waiver. Case is referred to Branch 1 to schedule ARGN.

9:55 AM case called. Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Amanda J Deweerd in court.  Attorney Tsz-King Tse appeared by video for Amanda J Deweerd. 
Defense has received discovery and a plea offer.
Hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Dated 03/03/2022, from State Public Defender Office to Eau Claire County Judges regarding Zoom appearances for out-of-county attorney appointments
